channel.title: How to I make drops able to pickup
channel.description: When i drop an item on my server. I am not able to pick it back up. Or when i kill a monster i can't pic up its drop - Please HELP!!! - ITS URGENT!!![br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 30, 2009, 07:41:56 pm[/size][hr]Please someone help?!
